title: Anyone else unable to login?
body: I wake up to being disconnected from league. After trying to log back in it says "unable to connect to login que". I really don't want to keep trying to login because my other account got banned for suspicious login the last time I failed to get in after so many tries. Is this a bug league is having or are the login servers down?

replies.body: I have given it a momemt for 30min and havent gotten on.

> [{quoted}](name=SloaneWolf,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziBEw6FT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-06-07T17:58:30.073+0000)
>
> I have given it a momemt for 30min and havent gotten on.

Same here.  I keep waiting, give it a few mins, then trying logging on again, and same response.   Rioters keep telling everyone "just wait, give it time" instead of owning up that maybe something went wrong, even something they didn't expect would go wrong and just tell everyone they will fix it as soon as maintenance has finished.

Circumstances and status can change in a maintenance environment, it's not a reluctance to own up or take accountability for something.  In this case, it looks like the login issues have escalated a bit, and the network team is investigating it.  Bookmark our[ current maintenance thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance) on this issue, it's where we've been keeping updates and ownership of any issue.  Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziBEw6FT,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-06-07T18:12:14.609+0000)
>
> Circumstances and status can change in a maintenance environment, it's not a reluctance to own up or take accountability for something.  In this case, it looks like the login issues have escalated a bit, and the network team is investigating it.  Bookmark our[ current maintenance thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance) on this issue, it's where we've been keeping updates and ownership of any issue.  Thanks!

Ty for the update, will pin thread.

We're currently undergoing [maintenance](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance) on NA, and there may be some hiccups in the meantime.  I've seen a few reports about login failures, but players have been able to log in after trying again.  Give it a moment, and you should get in!
It has been a week for me.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziBEw6FT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-07T17:36:45.709+0000)
>
> We're currently undergoing [maintenance](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/PTQej3Tj-june-7th-na-ranked-disabled-for-live-maintenance) on NA, and there may be some hiccups in the meantime.  I've seen a few reports about login failures, but players have been able to log in after trying again.  Give it a moment, and you should get in!

Ok, I'll wait a bit. Please don't ban this account for suspicious activity if I try to login multiple times.
Unable to connect to login queue for NA servers.
